title: Is it possible to run old binaries of Robocup Soccer Competition in Gazebo ?

content.raw:
Hey,
Is it possible to execute old binary files of Robocup 3D Sim competitions (e.g. UTAustinvilla http://chaosscripting.net/files/competitions/RoboCup/WorldCup/2013/3DSim/binaries/) and the log files in Gazebo 3D simulation soccer field?  The problem that I face while dong so is that on trying to run UTAustinvilla binary 2013, the agents appear but are not stable and eventually fall down. They are not even chasing the ball when they start walk.

My apologies if the question is vague or something, but please help me out.
content.html:
Hey, Is it possible to execute old binary files of Robocup 3D Sim competitions (e.g. UTAustinvilla http://chaosscripting.net/files/competitions/RoboCup/WorldCup/2013/3DSim/binaries/) and the log files in Gazebo 3D simulation soccer field? The problem that I face while dong so is that on trying to run UTAustinvilla binary 2013, the agents appear but are not stable and eventually fall down. They are not even chasing the ball when they start walk.

My apologies if the question is vague or something, but please help me out.
